sourcesContent:
import { Icon , Tag , Row , Col , Layout , Card } from 'antd'; import fetch from 'isomorphic-unfetch'; import Link from 'next/link'; import "../assets/styles.less"; import Carousel from '../components/carousel'; import WeatherAPP from '../components/weather'; const { Header, Content } = Layout; const Index = props => (
Welcome to Dora Blog
> About us
> Blog
{ props.data.map(view => (
  • 景點地址:{view.address}
  • 營業時間:{view.open_time?view.open_time:'無'}
  • 景點分類:{view.category.map(e => {e.name})}
 ))}
© 2020 Dora Blog
); Index.getInitialProps = async function() { const settings = { headers: { Accept: 'application/json', } }; const res = await fetch('https://www.travel.taipei/open-api/zh-tw/Attractions/All',settings); const data = await res.json(); return data; }; export default Index;
